This will cancel the process of adding or editing the customer as well as return to customer form.

This method will delete the selected appointment.
handleDeleteCustomer() - Method in class Controllers.CustomerForm
This method will delete customers from the database only if customers don't have an appointment.

handleMonthRadio() - Method in class Controllers.CustomerForm
LAMBDA EXPRESSION: Converts start time stamp to a local date time and checks if the appointment is in the selected month.

This method will get the users appointments.

This will show a report based on the user selections.

This method determines the behavior of the save button.

This method handles the behaviour of adding or updating customers.

Populate countries in combo box.

LAMBDA EXPRESSION: Converts start time stamp to a local date time and checks if the appointment is in the selected month.
